item.title: Companies in the Asia Pacific region anticipate an increase in fraud over the next five years
item.description:
A new report by Experian Asia Pacific, titled “The Economics of Fraud: Mitigating Risk Amidst Fast Growth and Innovation,” found that 59% of Asia Pacific businesses anticipate an increase in fraud over the next five years. This has led to more than half (51%) of these businesses investing more in fraud prevention.
